sn47.7:1.1: “Atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbatarajassa dugga visama desa, yattha neva makkatanam cari na manussanam.
sn47.7:1.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbatarajassa dugga visama desa, yattha makkatananhi kho cari, na manussanam.
sn47.7:1.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbatarajassa sama bhumibhaga ramaniya, yattha makkatananceva cari manussananca.
sn47.7:1.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, ludda makkatavithisu lepam oddenti makkatanam badhanaya.
sn47.7:2.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te makkata abalajatika alolajatika, te tam lepam disva araka parivajjanti.
sn47.7:2.2: Yo pana so hoti makkato balajatiko lolajatiko, so tam lepam upasankamitva hatthena ganhati.
sn47.7:2.8: ‘Ubho hatthe mocessami padanca’ti dutiyena padena ganhati.
sn47.7:2.10: ‘Ubho hatthe mocessami pade ca’ti tundena ganhati.
sn47.7:2.12: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, makkato pancoddito thunam seti anayam apanno byasanam apanno yathakamakaraniyo luddassa.
sn47.7:2.13: Tamenam, bhikkhave, luddo vijjhitva tasmimyeva katthakatangare avassajjetva yena kamam pakkamati.
sn47.7:2.14: Evam so tam, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
sn47.7:3.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ma agocare carittha paravisaye.
sn47.7:3.2: Agocare, bhikkhave, caratam paravisaye lacchati maro otaram, lacchati maro arammanam.
sn47.7:3.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo?
sn47.7:3.7: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
sn47.7:3.11: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn47.7:4.1: Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye.
sn47.7:4.2: Gocare, bhikkhave, caratam sake pettike visaye na lacchati maro otaram, na lacchati maro arammanam.
sn47.7:4.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo?
sn47.7:4.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.7:4.10: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.7:4.11: Ayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo”ti.
